column4: whats a good dvd player for ubuntu? cause totem aint working ...
also consider googling on how to change/modify the totem backend
have you tried xine/mplayer, and does it give any output?
as in, no video? or no command-line output?
how are you starting mplayer/trying to play the video with mplayer?
you can unmount the disk manually
please don't give up, it works for me :/
true... I guess it depends how much you want ubuntu for other things
yeah, what Pici said. Unfortunately, DVDs are encrypted in a manner which prevents free software from legally playing them
so you have to install this package in order to crack the encryption on the disks
gnome-system-monitor can do it, or you can type "killall mplayer" at the command line
what's it doing at the moment?
